Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute at Austin/Hirsch
ShortDescription: 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, North Ave, Central, Division and Austin due to, street blockage near Austin/Hirsch.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Austin, North Ave, Central, Division and Austin due to, street blockage near Austin/Hirsch.

Allow extra travel time.
